description.integration: ChatGPT is an AI-powered chatbot developed by OpenAI that uses natural language processing to generate human-like responses. It can assist with answering questions, writing content, coding, and more.

ai_description.integration: The OpenAI activity integrates ChatGPT into workflows, enabling natural language processing for tasks such as answering questions, generating content, coding, and more; it should be used when automating interactions that require human-like responses or leveraging AI capabilities, with operations including chat, model management, audio processing, embeddings, content moderation, image handling, file management, function tools, fine-tuning, batch processing, assistant management, thread handling, message management, run tracking, run step management, vector storage, and custom operations.
